General.Name: United Recommend International Co Ltd
General.Description: United Recommend International Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells printed circuit boards (PCBs). It offers flex PCBs; and rigid PCBs, such as wireless WIFI, projector, light, and power system drive boards, as well as solar panels. The company was formerly known as Best Friend Technology Co., Ltd and changed its name to United Recommend International Co., Ltd. in September 2021. United Recommend International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
